    • localhost

    • onResolveAddress

      public InetAddress onResolveAddress()
      Returns the first non-loopback, non-virtual, IPV4 InetAddress in the list of network interfaces. This is necessary on the Mac because Oracle broke InetAddress.getLocalhost() on the Mac (and does not intend to fix it)
      Overrides:
      onResolveAddress in class Host
